rules.title: Balconies, decks, & outdoor areas on upper floors

qualifiers.applicability: Roofed outdoor areas count toward gross floor area

dimensional: Width of overhang over the balcony
Width of overhang around the rest of the house

procedures: An outdoor area is considered roofed if the eave over that area is deeper than the eave over the rest of the building.

mandatory: Roofed outdoor areas count toward gross floor area
conditional_logic: Area counts if the overhang is greater than the overhang around the rest of the house.

special_cases: Pop-out balconies are subject to the same evaluation.

cross_references: Comparison of Roof Plans 1 & 2 in Figure 10
